about_the_game:
VERY ECCENTRIC IDLE GAME AGAIN!
Quantum Tunnel Idle is a unique game that blends the intrigue of quantum physics theories with the addictive elements of idle games. Embark on a journey with a determined monkey as it attempts to break through walls, aiming to demonstrate the concept of quantum tunneling. Dive into the mysteries of quantum mechanics in our immersive setting and enjoy our deep gameplay.

Just keep crashing into the wall!



Features

Upgrades
Each collision with a wall earns players gold. This gold can be used to upgrade dice, enhancing your capabilities and adding an additional layer of strategy and enjoyment to the game.

Prestige
As your journey progresses, the 'Prestige' feature becomes available. This allows for a part of the game is reset, offering the chance for even more powerful upgrades and breathing new life into your playthrough.

Theory
The 'Theory' feature unveils new quantum theories as you advance through each stage. Each theory can be strengthened over time, adding to the depth of the gameplay and giving you more insight into the complex world of quantum physics.

Apple Tree
The 'Apple Tree' feature, which allows players to grow apples over time. These trees yield various rewards, providing a continuous sense of achievement and discovery.

Controls

The monkey automatically continues to run to the wall. All you have to do is just click upgrade.


Enjoy our unique setting revolving around quantum mechanics and our deep gameplay. Quantum Tunnel Idle awaits your journey beyond comprehension.

name: QTI - Quantum Tunnel Idle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: CPU Penguin 4 or more
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: AN IDLE GAME BASED ON THE "TUNNELING EFFECT"!
supported_languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
